content: crochet ghost keychain pattern and photos property of @theknottynavajo materials worsted weight yarn 4 mm hook safety eyes i used 10 mm polyester stuffing stitch marker optional abbreviations r round mc magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet st s stitch es increase increase decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch notes this pattern is worked in continuous rounds so use stitch marker as needed body r1 leave about an 8 inch tail for sewing loop for keychain mc single_crochet 6 6 sts r2 increase in each st around 12 sts r3 *single_crochet 1 increase* repeat 6 times 18 sts r4 *single_crochet 2 increase* repeat 6 times 24 sts r5-10 single_crochet in each st around 24 sts with tail from beginning sew through top 3 times and secure with a knot on the inside insert safety eyes between r6 and r7 about 3-4 sts apart r11 this row is worked in the front loops only *single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in one st single_crochet slip_stitch* repeat 6 times stuff body r12 working in the back loops of previous row *single_crochet decrease* repeat 8 times 16 sts r13 decrease all the way around slip_stitch in next st 8 sts cut yarn and sew hole closed sew in ends and add your keychain now he s ready for all scary adventures stay spooky my friends for personal use only please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern as your own you may sell finished items you make from this pattern but please give me credit you can tag me on social media @theknottynavajo or use #theknottynavajo you may not use my pictures as your own for they are my property thank you if you have any questions don t hesitate to contact me instagram https //www instagram com/theknottynavajo/ facebook https //www facebook com/theknottynavajo/ ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/the-knotty-navajo
